column4: im useing the gl desktop stuff....and i hit something that let me zoom and pan around the desktops as if they where a cube...can anyone tell me what i hit to do that? i have things set to default keys and such...i just turned the effects on...but don't know how to use them
dosen't seem to work.... O_o could i have broken it....i did it by accedent the first time lol
do you have the desktop cube plugin enabled
how do i tell if i do or not.....it just worked for a second and i was like OOOOoo new eyecandy hehe
right click on the red gem icon
there is no red gem O_o where are you talking of?
should be in your notification area next to your clock
theres a little splotch next to the clock yellow in colour i click on it and it has a check mark next to the gl desktop and then a selection for prefrences
hit alt+f2 and type beryl-manager then hit enter
what happens when you hold ctrl+alt and then click the mouse
or hold the mouse button rather
by the way, you should be asking this in #ubuntu-effects
it just highlights the desktop it did it by accedent when i was playing a game.... wow to be precise i did it a few times then nothing would happen
